summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Existing Building Code, adding a new Chapter 22.110 to the Seattle Municipal Code to adopt by reference chapters 2 through 10, chapters 12, 13, 15, and Appendix A of the 2006 International Existing Building Code with errata published by the International Code Council; amending certain of those chapters and adopting a new Chapter 1 relating to administration for the Seattle Existing Building Code.
